forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy this morning. A few showers developing during the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 55F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 51F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
